com.cloudera.api.v5

Interface ClustersResourceV5

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClustersResource, ClustersResourceV2, ClustersResourceV3, ClustersResourceV4
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClustersResourceV6

    public interface ClustersResourceV5
extends ClustersResourceV4
    The root of the Cloudera API (v5). Provides access to all sub-resources available in version 5 of the API.
